step_data.thought: I'm now on the Orders tab of Adam Garcia's customer profile. Looking at the page, I can see a table that displays all orders for this customer. At the top of the table, I can see text that says '7 records found', which indicates that this customer has placed 7 orders. This is the customer order count I was looking for. I can also see all 7 order records in the table with details like Order #, Purchase Date, Total, etc. Now that I've found the information requested, I should inform the user of the order count.
step_data.action: stop('The customer Adam Garcia has placed 7 orders. This information is visible in the Orders tab of the customer profile, which shows all order details including order numbers, dates, and amounts.')
